versions.name: Shanty Am I (Santiana)
chorus: Seek the treasure, ride the winds
We are owed, but we are free
All across the plains of Serious.
verses: We were left to die when the great war came.
Amiral Shanty am I!
Times were hard for the island fair.
All across the plains of Serious
The mainland thugs had lost their souls.
Amiral Shanty am I!
They made us slaves and they beat us down.
All across the plains of Serious
Miss Shanty brought us to unite
Amiral Shanty am I!
From Erik north to southern Jan
All across the plains of Serious
Miss Shanty raised the black flag high
Amiral Shanty am I!
She drew her sword and she killed with a smile
All across the plains of Serious
Miss Shantys spirit lives in me.
Amiral Shanty am I!
Hers is the fury that keeps me alive.
All across the plains of Serious
